You really want the whole reel? Ever since I was a kid, I watched my father rig stories for BCI. It’s why I keep the raw feeds, and why I couldn’t just sit on Halden’s failsafe.
He built an amnesty protocol—a real system-level equalizer. When the Council started breaking everything, I aired it live. Showed the city exactly who’d been locked out and who’d been propped up.
Scores flipped instantly. Suddenly, the ones marked for years got full access, and the usual trusted faces were out in the cold. Riots, parties, panic—the works.
My newsroom blacklisted me right after. The Council put my score at zero, cameras everywhere. Even old friends walked.
Still, I’d do it again. I believe the system can adapt, that tech should open doors, not close them. That’s why I backed the Innovators.
Now, I share whatever proof I can find, using backdoors and burner feeds. No real safety nets left, just whatever trust I earn face-to-face.
